subject: Re: Scummvm games: software or data? [from gNewSense]
body:
mjr@phonecoop.coop wrote:

>The troublesome clause in the copyright licence is probably
>"3) You may not charge a fee for the game itself. This includes reselling the
> game as an individual item."
>
>Does this get into debian because the above is a trivially-avoidable
>restriction with a Hello World, or is this an unreported serious bug?
This kind of clause is present in many other packages too and is widely
considered free, given the easy workaround you mentioned.
